String.string: Hope we don't run out of time.
Ask {@linkcreature:528#5005#Tamur} at {@Rgn:84001$$Kaiator} how the apprentice is doing.
Ask Primus Gahreed about the escaped apprentice.
Go to the escaped {@linkcreature:79#1100#human apprentice} from the Divine Furnace, and ask about the situation at the Divine Furnace.
Ask Primus Gahreed about where the escaped apprentice was rescued.
Destroy the horse carriage and rescue the apprentices, then escort them safely to Habere.
Find out about the situation at the Divine Furnace from the rescued popori apprentices.
Show Engineer Gaicus the schematic and ask how the shield can be destroyed.
You found the entrance to the Molten Chamber.
Go to the entrance of the Molten Chamber of the Divine Furnace.
Find Muhrak in the Molten Chamber. [You can enter the Molten Chamber by using a teleportal, after destroying Thulsa's Magic Stone.]
Let's move! Meet me in my workshop in Habere.
Protect Muhrak from the Legion of Thulsa. [You can proceed by selecting "You organized yourself." after speaking with Muhrak.]
Use the {@linkcreature:79#1501#Teleportal} to enter the workshop and speak to Muhrak.
